section.name: Plugin Processor
section.p: The plugin processor is a build listener than handles the production of a Transit plugin descriptor.

tr.td: Create a plugin descriptor using runtime dependencies declared on the current project definition. The produced plugin is created under the ${basedir}/target/deliverables/plugins directory.

subsection.name: Sample plugin descriptor
subsection.pre:
